Articles.Content:
Hello kerbonauts! It's been a while hasn't it?

Today I'll post my dear creation, "The rabbit"! I recently started a new carreer mode, and this guy is my fresh, first aircraft to take off and not crash instantly  It's low-cost, and perfect for completing contracts here on Kerbin! It's also small and compact, so why not take it to Laythe too!? It also has Parachutes for landing anywhere on land! No runway needed! (at all)

 

Specs:

Parts: 27
Lenght: 6.69 m
Width: 8.09 m
Weight: 4.7 tons
 

Craft file: KerbalX - The rabbit

 

Note: The craft tends to nose-dive, so keep an eye on the W key

Thanks for reading!
